identifier.description: Initially a user defined identifier for the study. This study id will be replaced with a MetaboLights ID (MTBLS) when uploaded to MetaboLights

rules.error: Study identifier should be at least 8 characters long
Study identifier must start with MTBLS, followed by a number. Example: MTBLS350

title.description: A title for the Study. Please use the same title as the first publication
title.placeholder: Example: Metabolic study of Diabetes in Homo sapiens...

rules.error: Study title should be at least 8 characters long. Please use the same title as the first publication.

description.description: A brief description of the study aims. Please use the abstract of the publication
description.placeholder: Please provide a description of your experiment, why not use the abstract of your paper

rules.error: Study description should be at least 60 characters long. Please use the abstract of the publication

lastName.description: The last name/surname of the contact

rules.error: The last name/surname of the contact. This should be a minimum of 2 characters long

firstName.description: The first name of the contact

rules.error: The first name of the contact. This should be a minimum of 2 characters long

midInitials.description: The mid initial of the contact.

rules.error: The middle initial of the contact. This should be a minimum of 1 characters long

email.description: The email corresponding to this contact.

rules.error: Please provide a valid email address for the contact. This should include something like 'name@something.somewhere'

phone.description: An international phone number for this contact, if available.

rules.error: Please provide an international phone number for this contact. This should be a minimum of 10 numbers long

fax.description: A fax number for this contact, if available.

rules.error: Please provide an international Fax number for this contact. This should be a minimum of 10 numbers long

address.description: The address for this contact, preferably, their institution.

rules.error: Please provide an institutional ddress for this contact. This should be a minimum of 30 characters long
Please provide an institutional affiliation for this contact. This should be a minimum of 8 characters long

roles.label: User role
roles.description: The role of the person in this Study.

rules.error: Please provide an role for this contact.

pubMedID.description: The PubMed ID related to this publication if available (eg.18181111)

rules.error: Please only provide the id number, not prefixed with PMID:

doi.description: The DOI related to this publication if available (eg. 10.1111/111111)

rules.error: Please only provide the DOI, not the URL/http address

authorList.description: The authors who contributed to this publication. As appears in the publication, do not include affiliation

rules.error: Please provide a list of authors, separated by commas. As appears in the publication, do not include affiliation
Please provide the (tentative) title of your publication. This should be a minimum of 25 characters long

status.description: The status of this publication, e.g. Published, Submitted, etc.

rules.error: Please provide the publication status of your publication. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

studyDesignDescriptors.description: Add terms describing study design type eg. Celiac disease, Metabolic fingerprinting, ultra-performance liquid chromatography-mass spectrometry, targeted or untargeted metabolomics

rules.error: Please provide a valid ontology term for the factor. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

Parameter Value[Post Extraction].description: Extract concentration, Samples enrichment and resuspension processes e.g Dried under nitrogen, resuspended in H2O or pyridine, SPE column
Parameter Value[Post Extraction].placeholder: Dried under nitrogen, resuspended in H2O, ...

rules.error: Please provide a description of the Post Extraction steps in your study. This field must be at least 10 characters long

Parameter Value[Extraction Method].description: extraction method used. e.g methanol/chloroform extration (1:1 v/v)

rules.error: Please provide a description of the Extraction Method steps in your study. This field must be at least 10 characters long
Please provide a description of the Derivatization steps in your study. This field must be at least 10 characters long

Extract Name.description: User-defined names for each portion of extracted material.

rules.error: Please provide a description of the Derivatization steps in your study. This field must be at least 3 characters long

Parameter Value[Chromatography Instrumen.placeholder: Shimadzu Nexera X2 UHPLC system, Thermo Scientific Dionex Ultimate 3000 HPLC system,....

rules.error: Please provide a description of the Chromatography Instrument. This field must be at least 20 characters long

Parameter Value[Column model].description: Model or make of the of Column used
Parameter Value[Column model].placeholder: Accucore HILIC (2.6 µm, 2.1 mm x 50 mm; Thermo Scientific), Ascentis Express C18 (2.7 µm, 4.6 mm x 100 mm; Supelco)....

rules.error: Please provide a description of the model and make of the of Column used. This field must be at least 20 characters long
Please provide a description of the Column type used. This field must be at least 5 characters long
This field should be defined in our sample sheet

Label.description: Indicates a chemical or biological marker, such as a radioactive isotope or a fluorescent dye which is bound to a material in order to make it detectable by some assay technology

rules.error: Please describe the chemical or biological marker using an ontology term. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Parameter Value[Scan polarity].description: An acquisition mode to which specifies weather polarity is negative, positive or alternating.

rules.error: Please describe the acquisition mode. This field must be one of positive, negative, alternating, n/a

Parameter Value[Scan m/z range].description: The limit of m/z over which a mass spectrometer can detect ions.

rules.error: Please describe the m/z range. This field must contain the lover and higher values, like this '200-1000'

Parameter Value[Instrument].description: The name of the mass spectrometry instrument, manufacturer, model # operational software name operational software version
Parameter Value[Instrument].placeholder: AB SCIEX TripleTOF 5600+, Agilent 6530 Accurate-Mass Q-TOF

rules.error: Please give a detailed description of the mass spectrometry instrument. This field must be at least 15 characters long

Parameter Value[Ion source].description: The ion source use PSI-MS cv Ionization mode (EI, APCI, ESI#), vacuum pressure skimmer/focusing lens voltages (e.g. capillary voltage etc.) gas flows (e.g. nebulization gas, cone gas etc.) source temperature

rules.error: Please describe the ion source using an ontology term. This field must be at least 15 characters long

Parameter Value[Mass analyzer].description: the analyzer(s) used by the mass spectrometer, use PSI-MS ontology terms

rules.error: Please describe the mass analyzer source using an ontology term. This field must be at least 15 characters long

MS Assay Name.description: User-defined name for a MS assay.

rules.error: Please describe your ms assay name, which may vary from source name if using replicates. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Raw Spectral Data File.description: Name of the raw spectral data file generated by an assay. Do not include any folder names, only the filename.

rules.error: Please add the raw file name for this sample. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Parameter Value[NMR tube type].placeholder: 1.7 mm (Norell), 5 mm standard, 5 mm conventional, Shigemi, mircocell, ...

rules.error: Please describe the NRM tube type using an ontology term. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Parameter Value[Solvent].placeholder: 0.02 M phosphate buffered D2O, 0.9% NaCl in D2O, ...

rules.error: Please describe the solvent using an ontology term. This field must be at least 10 characters long
Please describe the pH value of the sample to one decimal

Parameter Value[Temperature].description: Sample temperature run in the magnet, in Kelvin

rules.error: Please describe the temperature in Kelvin
Please describe the pH value of the sample to one decimal
This unit field must be preceded by the field where you recorded the temperature
This field should be defined in our sample sheet

Label.description: Indicates a chemical or biological marker or observed nucleus

rules.error: Please describe the chemical or biological marker using an ontology term. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Parameter Value[Instrument].description: Name and model of the NMR instrument

rules.error: Please describe the NMR instrument using an ontology term. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Parameter Value[NMR Probe].description: Type of probe fitted to the spectroscope

rules.error: Please describe the NMR probe using an ontology term. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Parameter Value[Number of transients].description: Number of transients (scan) acquired for your experiment.

rules.error: Please describe the number of transients (scan) acquired for your experiment

Parameter Value[Pulse sequence name].description: Pulse sequence used to acquire the data

rules.error: Please describe pulse sequence name used for your experiment

Parameter Value[Magnetic field strength].description: a parameter expressed in Tesla to report the strength of the field

rules.error: Please describe the magnetic field strength used for your experiment, to one decimal if possible
Please describe the temperature in Tesla
This unit field must be preceded by the field where you recorded the stength of the field

Acquisition Parameter Data File.description: Name of the acquisition parameter data file gathered for this assay.

rules.error: Please add the acquisition parameter datafile name for this sample. This field must be at least 5 characters long

NMR Assay Name.description: User-defined name for a NMR assay.

rules.error: Please describe your nmr assay name, which may vary from source name if using replicates. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Free Induction Decay Data File.description: Name of the free induction decay data file gathered for this assay.

rules.error: Please add the fid file name for this sample. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Data Transformation Name.description: User-defined name for each data transformation applied

rules.error: Please add the data transformation name. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Normalization Name.description: User-defined name for each normalization applied

rules.error: Please add the normalization name. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Derived Spectral Data File.description: Name of the derived data file generated from spectral data by an assay. Do not include any folder names, only the filename.

rules.error: Please add the derived (nmrML/mzML/imzML) file name for this sample. This field must be at least 5 characters long

Metabolite Assignment File.description: Name of the metabolite assignment file gathered for this assay. Do not include any folder names, only the filename.

rules.error: The study filename must be minimum 15 characters long
The metabolite annotation filename must be provided and be in this pattern 'm_{assays.annotationValue} {assays.technologyType.annotationValue}_v2_maf.tsv'

name.description: The descriptive name of the protocol.

rules.error: Please provide the name of your protocol. This should be a minimum of 8 characters long

description.description: A brief description of the protocol. Please use the protocol reported in the publication

rules.error: Study protocol description should be at least 40 characters long. Please use the protocol reported in the publication
Please provide a valid ontology term for the factor. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

factorName.description: The name of the Factor driving this study, e.g. Dose, Collection Time Point, Compound, and so forth

rules.error: Please provide an descrition of the factor. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

factorType.description: The type of the Factor driving this study, e.g. EFO:Dose (from Ontology), etc.

rules.error: Please provide a valid ontology term for the factor. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

ontology-details.description: The type of the Factor driving this study, e.g. NCBITaxon:9606 (Homo sapiens), etc.

rules.error: Please provide a valid ontology term for the factor. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

ontology-details.description: The type of the Factor driving this study, e.g. BTO:0000131 (Blood plasma), etc.

rules.error: Please provide a valid ontology term for the factor. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

ontology-details.description: The type of the Factor driving this study, e.g. PATO:0001227 (Variant), etc.

rules.error: Please provide a valid ontology term for the factor. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long
Please provide a valid ontology term for the factor. This should be a minimum of 5 characters long

category.label: Characteristic
category.description: Characteristic category type. Example: Organism, Organism part, Variant // this needs different examples

samples.label: New sample names
samples.description: Please add sample names one per each line or add coma separated values

sub_techniques.name: Matrix-assisted laser desorption-ionisation imaging mass spectrometry (MALDI)

metabolites.label: Metabolites names
metabolites.description: Please add metabolites names one per each line or add coma separated values
